jlg-grid-cell/center.description: boolean false 内容是否居中

jlg-grid-layout/padding.description: string 0px 每个网格之间的间隔

jlg-grid-layout/inline.description: boolean false 是否行内布局

jlg-grid-layout/border.description: boolean false 是否显示边框

jlg-collapse/model-value.description:
currently active panel, the type is `string` in accordion mode, otherwise it is `array`, default: [].

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/collapse.html#collapse-attributes)

jlg-collapse/accordion.description:
whether to activate accordion mode, default: false.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/collapse.html#collapse-attributes)

jlg-collapse/change.description:
triggers when active panels change, the parameter type is `string` in accordion mode, otherwise it is `array`

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/collapse.html#collapse-events)

jlg-collapse-item/disabled.description:
disable the collapse item, default: false.

[Docs](https://element-plus.org/en-US/component/collapse.html#collapse-item-attributes)
